radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple radio-opaque deposits throughout, most prominent in the ascending and sigmoid colon.
Generalized mild to moderate reduction of FDG uptake in both cerebral hemispheres, consistent with nonspecific encephalopathy.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance angiogram of the brain

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal posterior rhythm, diffuse intermittent slowing in the delta frequency range, but no periodic sharp waves.
